sentence.Network_en: She went about her work quite as cheerlessly as usual.
sentence.Network_cn: 她和往常一样十分郁闷地着手做她的事.

sentence.Network_en: He cheerlessly set out to do the task.
sentence.Network_cn: 他开始没精打采做起这项工作.

sentences.sentence: "he cheerlessly set out to do the task"
